Melissa Bargeman: Lose 39 lbs in 30 days without dieting or exercising - a dream or reality?

We conducted clinical trials and uncovered a shocking truth...

Melissa Bargeman. Doctor of Biological Sciences, professor. 18 years of medical practice

Each of us wants to enjoy delicious food without any negative consequences: to be healthy and energetic, to dress beautifully and elegantly, to be sexy and desired, to look our spouse in the eye and see passion, to be confident looking in the mirror. But modern trends, stemming from abundance, do not allow most people to experience at least one of the above points. This is because food is no longer just a means of survival. Food has turned into a luxury, entertainment, and a way to spend free time. How do we enjoy it while staying healthy and happy?

Melissa Bargeman

Hello dear readers of Women's Health blog! My name is Melissa Bargeman, a well-known figure in the scientific community. I hold a PhD in Biological Sciences and have been a professor with 18 years of experience. Exactly 3 months ago, I, along with my colleagues, posed a question: how to overcome the 21st-century plague called "food abundance." No, abundance is good, but the consequences... Obesity is early mortality, problems with the cardiovascular system, joints, oncology, mental health, and quality of life. I think we don't need to continue, otherwise, this article will be a list of these very consequences. This problem needs to be urgently addressed! But how? Most people simply can't lose weight, and they need to be rescued.

One of the modern methods to save your health and life is weight loss supplements. On the internet, you can find a plethora of weight loss supplements, both cheap and expensive, promising incredible results. But do these supplements actually work, or are they scammers draining money from your wallets?Our task is to find out through conducting clinical studies . Which dietary supplement we have chosen for the research and why will be discussed further in the article...

Stage 1. Choosing a dietary supplement

Searching for the best candidate for clinical trials...

Our laboratory spent 7 days searching for the most promising dietary supplement for clinical research. We explored nearly every page on Google: forums, reviews, stores, and even recommendations from acquaintances. Our goal was to find a supplement that is completely safe for health in its composition and has positive reviews. And we succeeded!

Our choice fell on the renowned dietary supplement in the USA called EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER, which promises incredible results. Why? It's simple: ISO -certified 3rd party lab test, positive reviews and a completely natural composition that we have thoroughly examined and know to be safe. It is our duty to determine the actual effectiveness of EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER, to find out if the manufacturer's promises are true or if it's all fraud and deception.

Candidate found!

There were also some negative reviews about this supplement that have raised our concerns. Why does a product with so many positive reviews also have negative ones? After all, it has helped the majority of people. We will address this question later, but for now, let's move on. Read on for our next step...

Stage 2. Who wants to help science and lose weight?

We sent out over 1,000 emails to people with obesity from our database, inviting them to participate in the EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER study. To our surprise, almost everyone agreed - 897 individuals! We senteach person three bottles of EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER. Previously, we reached out to the official manufacturer of this product and purchased 3000 bottles at our expense.

From the group of participants, we asked a woman to provide an interview for this article before starting the intake of EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER and after its completion, so that our readers could have a better understanding of the progress of the clinical trials. For confidentiality purposes, we do not disclose her last name or show her face. Her name is Ronda. Read on to find out why Ronda was convinced that this supplement would not have any effect...

I have already tried to lose weight with the help of EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER...

I conducted a short interview with Ronda, a person who has stage 2 obesity.

— Melissa Bargeman: Hello, Ronda! Tell me and our readers a little bit about yourself./p>

— Ronda: Hello, Melissa and readers of this article! I'm 33 years old and at the beginning of the study, my weight was 194 lbs. I'm married and raising two children. I really want to lose weight and hope for your help.

— Melissa Bargeman: Why do you want to lose weight? Have you experienced any negative consequences of obesity?

— Ronda: I want to lose weight because I have started having health problems and more. I get short of breath even when I go to the store, my heart hurts a little, and my joints hurt. On top of all of this, I have complexes. I don't feel desired, my husband hardly pays any attention to me, and we have sex once every two weeks. I've started noticing how my husband looks at slim girls, and it worries me and makes me jealous. I'm afraid that he will leave our family for someone else. And it's very difficult to find beautiful clothes; it's as if this world is created only for slim people.

— Melissa Bargeman: I understand your concerns and sympathize with you. Obesity is really harmful both for your physical health and psychological well-being. Please tell me, when did you start gaining excess weight?

— Ronda: The weight gain began in a usual way, probably like most girls in my position - pregnancy. I am a mother of 2 children. Before my first pregnancy, my weight was 112 lbs and I felt very good! After the first pregnancy, my weight was already 152 lbs, and after the second 167 lbs. At that time, I wasn't upset about it, I was sure that I would lose weight a little later. I'll start eating less, join a gym. But everything turned out completely the opposite. I started trying diets and after them I did lose weight, but then gained weight back and even more! I never made it to the gym, raising children and work left me no energy. As a result, I gained weight from 167 lbs to 194 lbs. It's terrible, as is my health and appearance. That's my whole story, most people are like this.

— Melissa Bargeman: Don't give up, I'm sure you can handle this! When you received your package with EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER, you immediately said it wouldn't work, why do you think so?

— Ronda: The thing is, I tried EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER two months ago, and it didn't help me! I'm convinced it won't help now either, although there's still hope. I'm comforting myself by thinking that these bottles are slightly different, not like the ones I previously ordered.

— Melissa Bargeman: Very interesting observation. When we contacted the official manufacturer of EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER and asked them why there are also negative reviews of their product, they told us that many counterfeits are sold online due to the popularity of the product. We don't like to take their word for it, which is why we started this clinical study to test the effectiveness of the product. Ronda, we wish you and all of us success in this study, thank you for volunteering to help! We will interview you again in a month after using EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER. We have sent you the instructions, all you have to do is follow them.

— Ronda: I hope I bought a fake then and your package of EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER will help me. Whatever the result may be, thank you for your work, you are doing a great job and trying to convey the truth to the world. Until the next interview!

Next, you will find out: what were our concerns and did they come true? What was the result of the study participants?

We were worried for nothing... Diabetes, hypertension

It's no secret that most people have chronic diseases, including those caused by obesity. Our laboratory was concerned about whether chronic diseases would manifest themselves when taking EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER.The official manufacturer stated:

«There is no need to worry about side effects. Firstly, EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER is a completely natural product and is hypoallergenic. Secondly, to obtain registration and certification, it undergoes testing by independent laboratories. The tests have been successfully passed, and there are no reported side effects. It can even be taken by individuals with chronic conditions. However, we cannot vouch for counterfeit products, as they may contain anything. Please exercise caution.»

As we previously stated, the only way to sure is to try it for yourself! Therefore, we surveyed all our test subjects every day and monitored their health. To be clear, no problems were observed, including in people with diabetes and hypertension. But be vigilant, as the manufacturer of EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER said - don't fall for counterfeits, this applies to any product.But then something happened that we never expected...

39 lbs in 30 days, just follow the instructions... Incredible!

We present to you several photos of test subjects BEFORE and AFTER the clinical trial, with extremely unexpected results! Faces and names have been obscured for confidentiality.

Test subject Amanda

Test subject Veronica

Test subject Thomas

We surveyed all test subjects and reviewed their before/after photos from the study. My colleagues and I were very surprised! There were 47 cases of weight loss of 39 lbs or more in 30 days, these are incredible results! In the remaining cases, weight loss was less than 39 lbs, with an average weight loss of 40.7 lbs. In any case,these are extremely serious results that we must share with our readers.

All test subjects were given the following instructions:

  • 1. Lead the same lifestyle as before the start of the study.
  • 2. Eat moderate amount of food.
  • 3. Start with 1 capsule per day every morning. After 5 days, start taking 2 capsules a day, 30 minutes after food. *Don't take capsules after 3 PM.
  • 4. Fill out the questionnaire we send you daily in your lab account to measure performance and track health indicators.

After studying the daily responses to the survey from all test subjects, we have drawn some conclusions. Read on...

Among the study participants, the following observations were made... Results

Our clinical studies have confirmed the claims of the official manufacturer of EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER and all positive reviews of this product. Here are some observations from surveys of all participants:

— 38% of participants started losing weight only on the 12th day of taking EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER, on average

— 47% of the participants experienced regular bowel movements twice a day, similar to individuals with a fast metabolism, and their appetite decreased

— All participants with problematic skin (acne, oily or dry skin) had these symptoms disappear. This is a sign of detoxification, as the body began to cleanse itself

In conclusion: EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER does indeed work as claimed by the official manufacturer. Judging by the fact that some participants started to see weight loss only from the 12th day of intake, some negative reviews could be based on this, as people simply didn't complete the full one-month course or encountered counterfeit products. There is a detoxification effect on the body, and skin problems disappear. It definitely accelerates metabolism and reduces appetite, among other benefits!

Second interview with Ronda

— Melissa Bargeman: Hello again, Ronda. We have completed our study on the EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER dietary supplement, and we were pleasantly surprised by its effectiveness. Please share with me and our readers what you experienced during the course of taking this product. We already know that you were able to lose weight with its help, so how amazed are you by the results?

— Ronda: Good day. First of all, I would like to thank you once again for such a gift and opportunity. It's simply miraculous! And let me boast right away - my weight is now 147 lbs, I've lost 46 lbs in these 30 days. It's a record for me compared to all my previous attempts at dieting! Here's how it all went: I enrolled in the group of participants, received instructions and a package of EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER from you. Every day, I took EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER as instructed and filled out your daily surveys for reporting. In the first few days of taking the supplement, I didn't feel any difference. I thought I was right after my initial disappointment upon seeing the bottles of EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER, as my previous attempt with this supplement didn't help me. But on the 9th day of taking it, I felt light and full of energy! I stepped on the scale and saw -11 lbs. I was overjoyed because the supplement started working. It motivated me greatly to continue taking it according to the instructions. And after the 30-day study, I achieved these incredible results! As you mentioned in the instructions, I maintained my usual lifestyle and ate the same way as before the study. It's fantastic! I didn't notice any side effects. The fat just started melting away, that's all!

— Melissa Bargeman: Great, thank you for participating in our clinical trial. It is very important for us and for everyone who can't cope with obesity! Please tell us about your future plans and how you feel psychologically, what has changed?

— Ronda: My plans are to get back to my pre-pregnancy weight of 112 lbs. I'm confident that with another month of taking EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER, I'll easily achieve my goal! Psychologically, I've changed a lot. Since I started believing in my dream of having a fit body again, I smile more often, feel more confident, my insecurities are slowly disappearing, and I've become more calm and peaceful. My husband is also very surprised, and our relationship has improved. After a 30-day trial, he gave me flowers and lifted me up, it feels great to feel like a young girl again, as if I'm 20 years old again! Thanks again to you and your lab for providing me with these opportunities!

— Melissa Bargeman: Thank you, myself and my team are very pleased with your kind words! We wish you and your family success and prosperity, and we are confident that you will achieve your goal and return to your 112 lbs!

Clinical trial completed. What's next?

We are proud to announce that we have successfully completed the study and confirmed the effectiveness of EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER through experimentation. Finally, we can relax. But that's not all!

Do you remember the initial goal of this study? We want to help people with a life-threatening condition called "obesity. " And here's what we came up with: since we can confidently recommend the supplement called EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER, we reached out to the official representative once again and asked for a gift for all our readers - a free bottle of EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER for everyone!

Get for FREE!

Do you want to lose weight?

Do you want to be healthy and happy?

Do you want to look beautiful again and feel confident?

Then don't miss your chance! The number of gifts is limited, so you need to claim it as soon as possible.

To ensure that you do not accidentally order a fake, the official manufacturer of EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER has given us permission to place a link to their official website on our portal. This way, you can order the original EcoWise ADVANCED FAT BURNER directly for free as a gift to our readers!A wonderful opportunity, isn't it?
